name: Libertarian Micro Nation
description:
The idea is to make the money run out slower.

More people make the crane and deliveries cost more.

Unhappy people also make things more expensive.

UNFINISHED! I wanted to upload something for the effort I put in even though it's not fun and is poorly explained.

Haven't implemented the food system which would generate cash. Currently you can only run out of money at different speeds.

Also no music or sound. Like I said - it's unfinished but I wanted to try out an idea I had and this was a useful exercise.
